EmailTemplate.name: 2021 Dealer Update #4.2021 Dealer Update #4
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - January 2021
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | January 2021 New Sales Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins:
- 2021-09 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-09-Rev-A-Multipurpose-Control-and-Display-Unit-Replacement-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> Multipurpose Control and Display Unit (MCDU) Replacement Options - 2021-10 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-10 Rev A - FMS 6.1 Upgrade for Business Aircraft Equipped with NZ-2000.pdf]]> FMS 6.1 Upgrade for BGA Aircraft Equipped with NZ-2000 - 2021-42 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-42 Rev A GoDirect Cabin Router for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> GoDirect Cabin Router for Business Aircraft - OIB 2021-44 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB 2021-44 JetWave Promotions.pdf]]> JetWave Promotions
Dealers can find these bulletins on our website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
